Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I'm new to creating "adventure game" here. I think I'm doing pretty well on it.  My question is, how do I upload it as an app file (or to the PlayStore) because I want to share it to my friends because they are all android users and can't be bothered on playing it on a browser. 

Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
